text: Ne likhuwa niliboolela liomulembe nohomba liokhurisia balitangasia. Ne baliyilanga khu Murumwa nende khubalia bali nende obunyali mubo, balia abalikhabanga bakhamanyile. Ne tsikhayanga okhuba tsimbabaasi tsia Nyasaye khwinywe nende obukoosia bubwe, mwakhalondele shetani halali batiti mwinywe butswa
